cause.description:
Remember that ANIMAL that we all once loved? It was a magical ANIMAL...it would give us immense joy and pleasure.... But then this ANIMAL started to develop an EGO and thus this EGO made the ANIMAL think too much of it self thus transforming from SKAZI ANIMAL to SKAZI SUPASTAR !!!!!!
We created skazi and we will destroy skazi Faith in Goa :)
1. Skazi SUX
2. Skazi's killa prodigy rmxs SUCK
3. Skazi's killa metallica rmxs also SUCK
cause.name: Skazi Must Die
